newsitem.title: CONGO: President's forces fire rockets in Brazzaville.
newsitem.headline: President's forces fire rockets in Brazzaville.

text.p: Forces loyal to the Congo Republic's president, Pascal Lissouba, fired rockets on Monday into the northern suburb stronghold of his predecessor and rival Denis Sasso Nguesso, witnesses said.

Witnesses reported at least eight rockets being fired from government positions near the international airport, breaking a relative lull in clashes during which France started withdrawing its troops from the battered capital.
